content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STTrip') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTrip
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STTrip (
[tms_trip_id] bigint,
[tms_trip_driverid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_drivername] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_vehicleid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_vehiclefleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_trailerid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_trailer1fleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_sectrailerid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_trailer2fleetcode] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_trailersize] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_status] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_routeid] bigint,
[tms_trip_opsrouteid] bigint,
[tms_trip_startfromaddress] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_startfromlat] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_startfromlng] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_dispatchdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_stopaddress] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_stoplat] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_stoplng] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_insdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_moddate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_insby] bigint,
[tms_trip_onrouteid] bigint,
[tms_trip_uuid] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_insbyuser] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_thirdpartyid] bigint,
[tms_trip_timehash] int,
[tms_trip_onroutestatus] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_lastlng] float,
[tms_trip_lastlat] float,
[tms_trip_controllerid] bigint,
[tms_trip_trackstatus] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_lastrackid] bigint,
[tms_trip_customer] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_bookings] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_controller] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_transporter] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_legacyid] bigint,
[tms_trip_originatedfrom] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_local] int,
[tms_trip_startdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_enddate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_actualdeliverydate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_note] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_deliverydate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_internalexternal] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_pickupstartaddress] nvarchar(4000),
[tms_trip_originaletadate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_currentetadate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_lastetaupdate] datetime2(7),
[tms_trip_source] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_id] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_lmsid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_vid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_did] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_status] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_startdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_stopdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_vehicletype] int,
[orv_dispatch_uid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_estdepdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_trailer] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_trailer2] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_fromlocid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_tolocid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_site] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_etastatus] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_startinglat] float,
[orv_dispatch_startinglng] float,
[orv_dispatch_endinglat] float,
[orv_dispatch_endinglng] float,
[orv_dispatch_startingfrom] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_goingto] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_importissue] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_insdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_estarrdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_duration] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_distance] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_cost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_stoplat] float,
[orv_dispatch_stoplng] float,
[orv_dispatch_stopreason] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_startodo] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_stopodo] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_expduration] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_expdistance] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_expcost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_collectionid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_crew] int,
[orv_dispatch_crewnames] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_bocloseuid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_routing] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_swapct] int,
[orv_dispatch_debriefed] int,
[orv_dispatch_debriefnotes] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_bopin] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_cpicost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_labourcost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_maintcost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_inscost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_tollcost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_fuelcost] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_internal] int,
[orv_dispatch_childids] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_guid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_timedefinite] int,
[orv_dispatch_orvcode] int,
[orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenter] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexit] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_reroutect] int,
[orv_dispatch_actualarrdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_physicalstartlat] float,
[orv_dispatch_physicalstartlng] float,
[orv_dispatch_tsstartdepoexitapp] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_tsstopdepoenterapp] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_uncanceldate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_uncancelusername] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_lmsdebrifed] int,
[orv_dispatch_reviseddebrief] int,
[orv_dispatch_lhtransporter] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_triptype] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_startreason] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_route] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_tmstraileridentify] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_tmstrailer2identify] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_tmscontroller] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_routekey] nvarchar(4000),
[orv_dispatch_courierid] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_originalstartdate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_originalextarrival] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_recomputeoriginals] int,
[orv_dispatch_originalextdistance] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_originalextduration] bigint,
[orv_dispatch_moddate] datetime2(7),
[orv_dispatch_tmsmode] int,
[orv_dispatch_driversignature] bigint,
[tms_trip_appduration] bigint,
[tms_trip_driverduration] bigint,
[tms_trip_controlroomduration] bigint,
[tms_trip_arrivedontime] nvarchar(4000),


	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/sttrip.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STTrip 
GO
